API
Class Profile

java.lang.Object
  API.Profile

public class Profile
extends Object

Provides a Profile setting that allows users to set their buddies, settings, name and password

Constructor Summary
Profile(BuddyList buddyList, String settings, String name)
          Profile(BuddyList buddyList,String settings, String name) allows users to create their profile.
Profile(BuddyList buddyList, String settings, String name, String password, Boolean chkpassword)
          Profile(BuddyList buddyList,String settings, String name, String password, Boolean chkpassword) allows users to create their profile.
